title: Bloomberg Markets: Taylor on Financial Guidance for Widows

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Barbara Taylor\u0010Financial Advisor\u0010Farmington River Financial Group\u0010Discussing unique circumstances facing widowed individuals and offering guidance during life’s challenging times.
